description: Sometimes you need some "me" time. Have you ever wanted to learn how to play a musical instrument? How about giving guitar a whirl!
Sometimes you need some "me" time. One of the best things you can do for yourself is exercise. The benefits of group exercise have been well established. So go do some planks with some friends!
alt: A man and woman working out together in the outdoors

description: Sometimes you need some "me" time. And sometimes that means saying Om. De-stress and declutter your mind with some meditation!
alt: A woman meditates on a rock with the sun setting in the background

description: Sometimes you need some "me" time. There are few things as enriching as diving into a book. Through popular opinion, here's a list of 100 books you should read before die
alt: An aerial view of a book collection
